name: hungryturtlecode
description: This is the site that is available at [https://hungryturtlecode.com](https://hungryturtlecode.com)

scripts.start: export JEKYLL_ENV=development && concurrently 'webpack -w' 'bundle exec jekyll serve --livereload --drafts'
scripts.build: rm -r _site && export JEKYLL_ENV=production && webpack && bundle exec jekyll build
scripts.deploy: rm -r _site && export JEKYLL_ENV=production && webpack && bundle exec jekyll build && firebase deploy

author: Adrian Henry
